special_attacks: disease (DC 13), paralysis (1d4+1 rounds, DC 13, elves are immune to this effect)
melee: bite +5 (1d6+6 plus disease, paralysis, and trip)

sections.name: Special Abilities
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Ghouls/Example Ghouls/Ghoul Beasts/Ghoul Hound/Special Abilities

sections.name: Disease
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Ghouls/Example Ghouls/Ghoul Beasts/Ghoul Hound/Special Abilities/Disease

sections.body: Ghouls keep ghoul hounds much as humans keep hunting dogs—some ghouls view these vicious beasts as little more than tools, while more sentimental ghouls treat them as favored pets. Ghoul hounds obediently follow their ghoul masters.
A larger breed of ghoul hound, the grathkoll can be ridden by a Medium creature. A grathkoll is a ghoul hound with the giant simple template and a +10 bonus to its base land speed.

name: Ghoul Hound
organization: solitary, guard (2-4 plus 2-4 ghouls), or pack (4-6 plus 2-4 ghouls)
